text: For Manann's glory, you have purged the seas from the scourge that is Dastan Coldeye

Not as haughty anymore are we know, Gentlemen Jenkins.

These scoundrels shall bother the seas no longer.

The plus side of raiding raiders is they proof a valuable source of loot.

By inspecting local stories, you've analyzed this creature's evasive maneuver skills. Now you can hit this guy easily

By inspecting the whale's homeplace, you discovered that his staple shrimp has some weird consequences on him, and figured out that creature won't be able to move freely if we attack it 1 hour after it's dinner time.
Traders say that this creature may look like a daemon, but actually, it's not perfect and will reveal it's true flesh at certain times.
Wood Elves knew what terrified the whale when it was young. By using it, we can let it run for several hours, and start the battle with ease.
Pirates have witnessed the whale attack many times and we have analyzed it. Now we can avoid it's attack more easily
